name: Trash Attack
description:
!DISCLAIMER! This is my first ever Game Jam game, and also my first completed game that I've made (As I'm extremely new to game developement).

Trash Attack is a game I made for the SEAJAM in just a day and a half.  

How to play: You have a scoring system where bottles are worth 5, bags are worth 10 and can holders are worth 15 points. You have 60 seconds to collect as much plastic as you can before your time runs out!!

I hope you enjoy this game and have some fun with it! :)
